class_notes: Online asynchronous with some synchronous sessions TBA. On-Campus dates: Nov 10-13.
course_description: This final course in the nurse-midwifery sequence, prepares students to merge the professional role and responsibilities of clinical management in transitioning to independent, full-scope practice as a nurse-midwife. Emphasis is on application of the nurse-midwifery process and health advocacy.
prerequisites: NRSG 630 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2994, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Stec/Edwards, Status: Open
